reviewText: Championship Game disc was not in package.....received "bonus" disc/game instead.
It was Awesome!!  Exactly what the seller said it be!  :)))

Son is a huge Razorbacks fan...
I remember watching this game, but he was so small he can't remember.
This is the perfect item to take him back to that time and let him relive this moment!!
Good stuff and I love the way this is shot and of course I'm a Richardson and Arkansas Fan!  Thank you Mr. Long for recognizing Ole Nolen!
Was everything I had hoped it would be and more. I and my family enjoyed reliving a very proud time in Razorback basketball. Gave it to my grandson/son as a gift and they really enjoyed it.
